about.title: About Dr. Ashraf
about.description: Dr. Ashraf Kotob is a highly experienced consultant physiotherapist with over 20 years of dedicated practice in the field of rehabilitation and manual therapy. His expertise spans across spine rehabilitation, neurological conditions, sports injuries, and post-surgical recovery.

treatment-philosophy.title: Treatment Philosophy
treatment-philosophy.description:
Our approach focuses on personalized care, combining evidence-based treatment techniques with manual therapy expertise.
We believe in treating the root cause, not just the symptoms. Ensuring long-term recovery 
  and preventing future injuries.
